pages.text: $(li)The Anvil is a very useful block that allows you to repair items, rename them and combine enchantments.$(br)$(li)Just place it like other blocks and right click on them to open the Anvil GUI.

$(br)$(li)Anvils will change their apparence depending of their current durability.$(br)$(li)As the Sand or Gravel, Anvils have gravity.$(br)$(li)If some creature is hitted by an falling Anvil, it will receive some damage.

pages.title: Rename Items
pages.text: $(br)$(li)You can place any item and change its name spending 1 Level of Experience.$(br)$(li)This can be especially used in Nametags and Locks.

pages.title: Repair Items
pages.text: $(br)$(li)You can place any tool and the material which was used for its crafted in an Anvil to repair it.$(br)$(li)Depending of the reparation, it will cost more or less Levels of Experience.$(br)$(li)For example, you can place an Iron Pickaxe and an Iron Ingot to repair it.

pages.title: Enchanting
pages.text: $(br)$(li)You can place any tool and an Enchanted Book to enchant it.$(br)$(li)You can combine multiple Enchanted Books to create a new one.$(br)$(li)Depending of the level of enchanting it will cost more or less Levels of experience.
